title: If we pray the 2 rakat Wudu prayer 5 times a day , will ALL our sins be FORGIVEN? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Amatullah from Bangladesh Assalamu Alaikum Sheikh Wa'alaykumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Sheikh there is a prayer that if we make wudu and then pray to rakas with complete focus then our all sins will be forgiven so we make wudu like five times a day for our five prayers so we can pray this salah five times a day the wudu salah and if we don't keep complete focus then will not our sin be forgiven the condition is related to having full concentration without speaking to yourself about worldly matters fulfill the condition you get the reward without fulfillment then you don't get the reward it's very simple math one plus one equals two can we do it five times a day you can do it a hundred times a day every time you make wudu you pray two rakas for the sake of Allah without talking to yourself or engaging in worldly thoughts or thinking about the groceries or where I parked my car and if you succeed in that Allah will forgive all of your sins
